attributes.action: keep council tax increases in line with inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every year council tax goes up by 2 or 3 times the rate of inflation this is not fair and should not be legal. it is only a matter of time before the council tax bill exceeds peoples wages.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with severla already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=council+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
